title: Pilot
description: A high-school graduate makes a momentous decision that puts her life on a much different track than either she or her parents envisioned.

title: The Last Stand
description: Felicity's parents linger in New York trying to understand her decision, Noel deals with a potentially homicidal student, and Ben receives a note from Felicity.

title: Hot Objects
description: It's Felicity's first college party, and she tries to work up the courage to ask someone to go with her. Ben gets stuck in an acting class, and Noel has concerns about his party suppliers.

title: Boggled
description: A game of Boggle gets complicated, Ben faces defeat, and a refrigerator comes to represent much more than an appliance.

title: Spooked
description: A frightening experience pulls Ben and Felicity together, but then pushes them apart.

title: Cheating
description: An attempt to help Ben, puts both his and Felicity's college career at risk, the Tin Man pursues Elena, and Julie worries about impressing her boyfriend.

title: Drawing the Line: Part 1
description: Ben is having a hard time forgiving Felicity, and her distress causes her to abuse her friendship with Noel; Elena may have to leave school, and Julie's boyfriend is moving too fast.

title: Drawing the Line: Part 2
description: Julie has to come to terms with what happened, but Felicity may be hindering the process. Meanwhile, a high school student is visiting, but the only thing on her mind is partying.

title: Thanksgiving
description: Thanksgiving vacation brings about a separation of the friends - or does it?

title: Finally
description: Felicity and Noel try to delay determining their relationship until after finals, and Ben begins a new relationship.

title: Gimme an O!
description: Back from Christmas vacation, Felicity propositions Noel, but a fire and other impediments may doom the plans.

title: Friends
description: Ben must run the gauntlet of Sensa's family to fix a vending machine problem, Julie gets information about her biological mother, and Felicity weighs whether to tell a friend of an infidelity.

title: Todd Mulcahy: Part 1
description: An old friend of Felicity's comes to visit, Elena is forced to deal with Blair, and Julie makes a risky decision.

title: Todd Mulcahy: Part 2
description: Tragedy causes Felicity to remember how it was, and Julie mails her tape - which she immediately regrets.

title: Love and Marriage
description: Noel's brother comes to town with surprising news, Felicity agrees to a proposal with Javier, and Ben wrestles with trying out for another sport.

title: The Fugue
description: The reappearance of Hanna in New York has unexpected repercussions for Noel and Felicity, and Ben bonds with his team.

title: Assassins
description: Felicity and Noel deal with repercussions of their respective evenings, a game of 'Assassins' puts Elena in overdrive, and Ben neglects Julie.

title: Happy Birthday
description: Noel's distress over Felicity causes him to start apartment hunting, Ben picks up a bad habit, and Julie's mother reappears.

title: Docuventary
description: Sean's film of student life ends up focusing on Felicity and Noel, and he gets some surprising footage.

title: Connections
description: Ben's financial problems cause him to do stupid things, Noel and Felicity explore being "just friends," and Elena starts a relationship.

title: The Force
description: Meghan's spells wreak havoc with Felicity's life.

title: Felicity Was Here
description: Felicity has to make a choice, and Julie's heart is broken.

title: Sophomoric
description: Felicity starts her second year at college with a possible new relationship, and the aftermath of her decision to cope with. Elsewhere, housing shortages cause unusual living arrangements.

title: The List
description: Ben worries about Felicity's expectations of him, Sean and Julie throw a party, and Felicity tries unsuccessfully to counsel one of her charges.

title: Ancient History
description: Felicity's decision about her hair leads to even more life changes, Julie looks for an apartment, and Noel takes an art class.

title: The Depths
description: A stalled subway train forces Felicity and Julie to confront each other, Noel and Ruby go to an art show, and Ben stands up to a client.

title: Crash
description: Noel and Elena become obsessed with a video game, Felicity goes out on a blind date set up by her professor, and Ben is confused by Maggie's actions.

title: The Love Bug
description: Felicity, Ben, and Noel each deal with uncertainties in their individual relationships, and Mono hits campus just in time for mid-terms.

title: Getting Lucky
description: A stray dog Felicity picks up on the street impinges on everyone's lives, and provides her with plenty of excuses for not taking the next step with David.

title: Family Affairs
description: Holiday gatherings are difficult for Felicity and Ben. Ben, because he has to work a party given by Maggie's husband, and Felicity feels pressure from an unexpected family visit and from David.

title: Portraits
description: Felicity and Noel struggle against feelings for each other while worrying how their actions will affect their grade, Ruby makes a surprise visit, Julie meets a music producer, and Ben is on short-time to complete a final in American Lit.

title: Great Expectations
description: Felicity's father accepts a position in town, and his never-ending presence begins to grate, Ben reconsiders his decision about Felicity, and Julie begins to doubt the intentions of Erik.

title: Help for the Lovelorn
description: This episode, a tribute to The Twilight Zone, follows Felicity as she tries to heal her broken heart and strange doings at The Clinic.

title: The Slump
description: Ben and Felicity are forced into counseling for their prank at the pool, Elena gets a new lab partner, and Noel's argument with Ruby is more serious than he thought.

title: Truth or Consequences
description: Felicity and Ben begin a community service assignment.

title: True Colors
description: A panicked Noel distances himself from Ruby.

title: Things Change
description: Greg is in a bind when a doctor leaves the clinic.

title: Revolutions
description: Julie has difficulty sleeping because of nightmares about Zach.

title: Docuventary II
description: Sean resumes his documentary film project.

title: Party Lines
description: Sean follows Ben and Felicity with his camera and pesters them.

title: Running Mates
description: Ben catches Andre defacing Felicity's campaign posters.

title: Ben Was Here
description: Ben waits outside the cabin until he can talk to Felicity alone.

title: The Aretha Theory
description: Greg dumps Felicity because she's still hung up on Ben.

title: Final Answer
description: Felicity and Ben try to avoid one another until the end of finals.

title: The Biggest Deal There Is
description: Felicity turns down the internship so she can spend the summer with Ben.

title: The Christening
description: Felicity falls in love with an apartment.

title: The Anti-Natalie Intervention
description: After learning of Noel's marriage, Richard organizes an intervention.

title: Hello, I Must Be Going
description: Ben's mother tells him that his father has been missing for several days.

title: Greeks and Geeks
description: Felicity lies to Mrs. Emrick about Julie's whereabouts.

title: Surprise
description: Felicity tries desperately to track down Randy.

title: One Ball, Two Strikes
description: Felicity asks Randy to talk to Ben.

title: Kissing Mr. Covington
description: Mr. Covington returns to town with the hopes of reconciling with his son.

title: A Good Egg
description: Javier and Samuel decide to become parents.

title: James and the Giant Piece
description: Ben encourages Molly to break up with James.

title: Final Touches
description: Molly apologizes to Felicity and Ben.

title: And to All a Good Night
description: James persistently tries to call Molly, who has broken up with him.

title: Girlfight
description: Elena is wounded in the shoulder.

title: Blackout
description: A blackout and a visitor bring changes to the group. Elena worries about the reason Tracy broke up with her and considers doing something about it.

title: The Break-Up Kit
description: Being secretly wooed by others softens the blow of breaking up for Felicity. Molly returns from England. Meghan holds a séance.

title: Senioritis
description: Noel is upset knowing that Ben cheated on Felicity, and Ben wonders about Noel's motives in offering Felicity a job in Seattle.

title: It's Raining Men
description: Ben and Noel fight over Felicity. Javier is hospitalized from the stress of final examinations, and puts Felicity in charge of Dean & Deluca.

title: The Last Summer Ever
description: Noel graduates and tries to finally break from Felicity, and Ben starts thinking seriously about his future.

title: The Declaration
description: Javier goes crazy planning a wedding, Ben comes home with a plan, and Felicity and Noel struggle with their futures.

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
description: Noel and Felicity deal with the consequences of their encounter, Elena and Tracy's wedding is threatened by various incidents, and Sean and Meghan make a decision.

title: Your Money or Your Wife
description: Meghan's parents insist on meeting Sean and his family, Ben struggles in organic chemistry, and Felicity has tuition issues.

title: Miss Conception
description: Felicity competes in a beauty pageant and against an under-handed competitor, Meghan has to make a decision regarding her family, Noel gets an unexpected job offer, and Ben finds a lab test voucher.

title: Boooz
description: A dismal exam result and a disastrous encounter with the instructor send Ben and his lab partner on a binge, Noel and Javier go to Atlantic City, and Felicity's pageant comes back to haunt her.

title: Oops... Noel Did It Again
description: Bens father is sick and disrupts birthday plans for Felicity, Noel chafes at the tedium of his guidance job, and new roommates tax Elena's patience.

title: The Storm
description: Noel begins a new graphics job, Ben's mother comes to town, and Felicity tries to make it up to Ben.

title: The Last Thanksgiving
description: Felicity and company spend what may be their last Thanksgiving together. Meanwhile, Noel and his brother have a rather calamitous one.

title: Moving On
description: Things unresolved between Ben and Felicity result in matchmaking attempts by their friends, Noel sees a doctor.

title: Fire
description: Noel is advised to stop seeing Felicity for awhile, Ben has a major O-chem exam he's having trouble studying for, and Felicity makes another attempt to get into an Art Honors program.

title: A Perfect Match
description: A snowstorm proves fortuitous for Felicity, Ben's father has a crisis, and Noel starts his business with an unexpected partner.

title: Future Shock
description: Lauren makes an announcement to Ben. Noel and Sean bid for an account against the company who fired him, and Felicity is conflicted when pressured by her mother to consider another career.

title: Kiss and Tell
description: Tensions between Noel and Zoe rise. Sean and Meghan need different things from their relationship, and Ben confronts his dad and Felicity.

title: Raising Arizona
description: Ben's struggles with Lauren to maintain contact put him and Felicity at risk, especially when she seeks solace from Noel. Noel, meanwhile, has relationship issues of his own, and Meghan and Javier compete for the same part.

title: The Paper Chase
description: Under stress, Felicity does the unthinkable, Noel and Sean have business conflicts, and Javier must make a decision about what to tell a friend.

title: Ben Don't Leave
description: Felicity faces the hearing for her paper against a backdrop of stress as Lauren decides to leave early, and a car accident occurs. Meanwhile, Noel - spurred on by Sean - begins to doubt Zoe's interest in him.

title: The Graduate
description: Felicity finds out whether she will graduate, and Ben makes a decision about his future. Noel and Sean have a career crisis, and Felicity's parents descend.

title: Time Will Tell
description: The death of a friend sinks Felicity into a depression, and when she finds out Ben has been cheating on her she reevaluates the choices she has made.

title: The Power of the Ex
description: Felicity's choices affect everyone, and someone unexpected re-enters Noel's life.

title: Spin the Bottle
description: Ben challenges Felicity on her decision to leave him, Noel and Felicity decide to move in together, and Julie visits, creating havoc.

title: Felicity Interrupted
description: Concerned for Felicity's sanity, Noel and Ben take action. Meghan plays with Sean for revenge, and Ben and Julie plan a road trip.

title: Back to the Future
description: Devastated by a tragedy she believes is her fault, Felicty tries to put things right.
